title: Maximum capacity of eligible customer-generator
context: [ยง269-101.5] Maximum capacity of eligible customer-generator. The eligible customer-generator shall have a capacity of not more than fifty kilowatts; provided that the public utilities commission may increase the maximum allowable capacity that eligible customer-generators may have to an amount greater than fifty kilowatts by rule or order. [L 2005, c 104, ยง1]
